Rodimus said"I acted like child and when I,... i tried to create some 
trouble among you and Nightlight... and create you some troubles with 
Hydras... I ask your forgiveness... I volunteer for the job..."

<NEW>

Rodimus looked over at Windlord, a look of shared pain in his face.
"There are several of us that he felt the sting of Hydras' power."
Rodimus said as he strightened. He looked around at the others, his
optics flashing as he contained his own internal anger. "Hydras has
long used this method of control to create his troops from the ashes
of Maximal protoforms." His voice deep and controlled. "He must be
stopped."

Walking more or less to the middle of the room he turned to face the
others, "There is little doubt that Hydras has spent at least some of
this time shoring up his base against the same methods that we used to
enter before." Rodimus frowned, "and Cyclonus is a force to be
reckoned with as well."

Turning his head to look at Tuscon Rodimus continued, "Like you he has
felt the power of the Matrix and has been forever changed by it, but
in his case it has been corrupted, a dark twisted version of it."
Rodimus clenched his fist, "But do not mistake it for a moment that
his wisdom and cunning are greater than they had been before - he
knows much more than he reveals."

Cheetor crossed his arms over his chest, "Power or no power, we will
blast him back to Cybertron!" he said, his voice exuding that
exuberant confidence that was ever his trademark.

Rodimus smiled, "Good, we will need that spirit soon." He turned to
look at the others, "But first we need a concrete plan of action, to
be sure that we all act together." He looked around, "Is anyone
keeping watch on Hydras' base?"

(TAG)

Preston
